text: int main ( ) { int c = 0 , m , nbi , te , i = 0 , s = 0 , p = 0 , t = 0 , k , l = 0 , * ans , j = 0 , n , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , max [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & te ) ; ans = ( int * ) malloc ( t * sizeof ( int ) ) ; k = 0 ; while ( l < te ) { c = 0 ; t = 0 ; s = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { max [ i ] = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ max [ i ] ] ) max [ i ] = j ; } for ( j = i + 1 ; j < n ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = - 1 ; } i = 0 ; p = 0 ; while ( c <= n - 1 ) { if ( t == i ) { m = 0 ; for ( k = p ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ k ] [ max [ k ] ] > m ) { m = max [ k ] ; i = k ; } } t = p - 1 ; p = m ; s = s + a [ i ] [ m ] ; i -- ; c ++ ; continue ; } if ( a [ i ] [ p ] > a [ i ] [ p - 1 ] ) { s += a [ i ] [ p ] ; c ++ ; i -- ; } else { s += a [ i ] [ p - 1 ] ; c ++ ; p -- ; i -- ; } } ans [ l ] = s ; l ++ ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < te ; i ++ ) { printf ( "%d\n" , ans [ i ] ) ; } return ( 0 ) ; }
